item.title: Data Visualization Workshop, Part 1
item.description: Joyce Robbins presents a workshop on creating heatmaps in R, and other more general data visualization tips and tricks. Visit our Meetup page for more details and to RSVP. Joyceâ€™s GitHub repo for this talk can be found here. Date: Thursday, August 17, 2017 Time: 7pm Instructor: Joyce Robbins Host: Byte Academy
